p: When a model of chemical stress induced by potassium dichromate in human hepatoblastoma HepG2 cells was used, ethanolic extracts of L. album showed a cytoprotective effect in vitro [ 40]. Purified extract counteracted ROS formation in oxidative stress conditions in tested cells. The cytoprotective effect of 50 Âµg/mL L. album purified ethanolic extract seems related to the presence of verbascoside, which exhibited the highest cytoprotective action from all the polyphenols identified in the ethanolic extract.
